newsArray.title: PCB Cuts Short National Championship After Fire Incident At Karachi Hotel: What’s Next?
newsArray.description: A fire at a Karachi hotel forced the PCB to end the National Women’s Championship early. The incident adds to growing uncertainty surrounding the upcoming Champions Trophy.

newsArray.title: PCB ends National Women’s C’ship after fire incident in team hotel
newsArray.description: “PCB has decided to curtail the National Women’s One-Day Tournament 2024-25 in Karachi following a fire incident at the team hotel,” the PCB said in a statement.

newsArray.title: पाकिस्तानी खिलाड़ियों के होटल में लगी आग, रद्द करना पड़ा टूर्नामेंट, ऐसे चैंपियंस ट्रॉफी कराएगी PCB?
creator: TV9 Bharatvarsh
newsArray.description: पाकिस्तान में फरवरी-मार्च के महीने में चैंपियंस ट्रॉफी का आयोजन होना है जिसमें 8 टीम हिस्सा लेंगी. हालांकि इसके लिए टीम इंडिया ने तो पहले ही पाकिस्तान जाने से मना कर दिया है, जिसको लेकर दोनों देशों में बवाल मचा हुआ है. अब इस हादसे में PCB की आयोजन की काबिलियत पर सवाल खड़े कर दिए हैं.

newsArray.title: Travis Head supports Rohit Sharma’s decision to stay with family instead of Joining Indian squad for Border-Gavaskar Trophy 2024-25
creator: Krishnakant Kukreti
newsArray.description: On the sidelines of Australia's practice session in Perth, Travis supported Rohit's decision to stay with his wife and not travel for BGT, stated that he would have done the same thing if he was in Rohit's place.The post Travis Head supports Rohit Sharma’s decision to stay with family instead of Joining Indian squad for Border-Gavaskar Trophy 2024-25 appeared first on Cricket Country.
